phrases: I am sorry for lyin' to you.
I forget what I was like before I met you
Kick my heels going down the slope
It is like an endless summer vacation
Feels like sneakin' into the swimming pool
Hey, let us swim with our clothes on, jump in!!
This beat that pierces my heart is strange
Do not you go, it is twined around my ears
and will not leave me ever again
Where are you going this early in the morning?
I thought you were acting odd last night.
Looks like the sneaking suspicion I had was spot on.
I am not moving, you idiot!
If I do, you mean to go away for good, do not you?!
You are going to run off somewhere!
Are you planning on leaving everyone and everything behind?!
Since when did you become such a coward?!
Where is the guy that told me nothing good comes out of being afraid?!
What the hell are you guys doing this early in the morning?!
So you two were fighting about the festival?
I understand that you are really into it, but...
I could not sleep last night...
The truth is I was scared, too...
Let me stay like this... just for a minute...
Did you bring in today's paper?!
I left it by the phone.
Hey, at least let him set foot in the house first...
Everyone, I am sorry for being away all this time.
I do not know if you will like it or not, though...
Something expensive like this is wasted on me...
A child does not go turning down a present from his parent.
Oh, looks like everyone got a present.
Are you coming to practice today?
Startin' today, I am going to practice my ass off for the festival.
That was a weird way to greet to each other.
Yes, I was hoping that you would play bass for us.
You are asking me out of the blue...
Adults have a lot of things on their plate, you know.
And there would be so much to prepare...
Are not no way we can lose now!
How is it going for you guys?
Right now, we are in the middle of getting our costumes fitted.
There is no way we are going to lose against you guys this year.
We do not have any razzmatazz.
At this rate, we might not be able to beat them...
All we got to do is put our music face-to-face against theirs.
I just do not want to have any regrets...
But appealing to people who have no interest in jazz is a tall order.
There are still ten days left.
Ri'ko, if you are going to refuse, now's the time.
Because if you decide to do it, we are not going to go easy on you.
You do not want to sing, tell us to shove off right now.
Though I hope you do not turn us down...
I will give it a try.
Raindrops on roses and whiskers on kittens...
Raindrops on roses and whiskers on kittens...
No, you have got no swing!
Raindrops on roses and whiskers on kittens
Bright copper kettles and warm woolen mittens
Brown paper packages tied up with strings
These are a few of my favorite things
Cream colored ponies and crisp apple strudels
Doorbells and sleigh bells and schnitzel with noodles
Wild geese that fly with the moon on their wings
These are a few of my favorite things
Girls in white dresses with blue satin sashes
Snowflakes that stay on my nose and eyelashes
Silver white winters that melt into springs
These are a few of my favorite things
I simply remember my favorite things
And then I do not feel so bad
The footsteps of a certain person heading towards the house...
The sound of the piano and drums riffing in the basement...
Those are a few of my favorite things...
What the heck is that, Sentaro?
Even before Ri-chan said hers, I had something in mind.
My favorite thing is this time... right now.
All that is left is playing our best at the festival.
How about playin' Moanin' one more time?
Nah, let us save it for tomorrow.
If we started jamming now, we would not stop.
Ah, well, you do not need a score for jazz.
An' I can just give it to him tomorrow.
I am going to run to deliver something he left behind.
You might not be able to catch up.
It is almost time for our battle.
Do not tell me he is late?
He got into an accident on a motorbike last night...
I will go to the hospital to see how he is.
Stay here until I get back.
I have dashed down this slope countless times, but it is never felt this long...
I will help you when it is your turn, so please get in line.
I heard there was an accident...
They have finished operating... but it is serious head trauma...
Might never wake up again... the doctor said...
Even when Sen is all bloody from a fight, he just laughs it off!
Sachiko is the one who is in there.
I do not know why... but Sis was riding on the back of Bro's motorbike last night...
They got hit by a car...
He is hurt, but not too bad.
He was sitting over here just before...
The place he is most likely to go is...
I have seen this angel before somewhere...
If you are going to take somebody to Heaven, could you make it me an' not Sachiko, angel?
Why do I end up hurting the ones I most want to protect?
This way, we do not have to see each other cry.
It is okay to cry, Sen.
You have been keeping it bottled up all this time...
At the time, it looked like he was just stepping out...
If you are able to eat these...
Do you know where my big bro, Sen went?
He would normally never give me a ride on his bike.
But I had a twisted ankle and kept complaining about it to him.
I have to apologize to him...
Sa-chan, right now, if you focus on getting better, Sentaro will come back soon!
You want to show him that you are healthy again, right?
I said all that to Sa-chan, but the truth is...
Kaoru-san, what will I do if Sentaro never comes back?
I bet when we least expect it, he will suddenly turn up.
Do not you have that feeling?
He will come back, will not he?
Do I know where he might be?
No, I am afraid I do not.
He once told me the reason he always wore the rosary as a necklace was because
he was afraid that if he lost it, he would be abandoned by the world...
I thought maybe Sen had come back.
I will never be able to practice with him again.
W-What are you talkin' about, Richie?
I waited for you on that slope
There was a'goodbye' blurred far away
I was so weak, so awkward, and so fragile back then
But you gave me a small pair of wings
In the twilight hour of the sky,
I am searching for a gleam of light
If only I could have said that I love you
The note that I wrote in the corner of my textbook
has never been delivered to this day
